headline: International Markets and Equifax (EFX): A Deep Dive for Investors
summary: Evaluate Equifax's (EFX) reliance on international revenue to better understand the company's financial stability, growth prospects and potential stock price performance.

headline: Equifax: Near-Term Weakness That May Lead To Guidance Revision (Rating Downgrade)
summary: Despite solid 4Q24 results and medium-term growth potential, Equifax's near-term earnings outlook is poor. Read why I downgrade EFX stock from buy to hold.
